alert.note: Alert for Jasper (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 29 at 6:36PM CST until November 29 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CST FOR CENTRAL JASPER COUNTY... At 636 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located over Vernon, or near Stringer, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Paulding around 700 PM CST. Orange around 710 PM CST. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
